category.pattern: Hot Sun Sunny Warm Boiling Blazing Sunshine Warmer Hotter
category.template: Do you think it’s getting warmer? How can you tell? Do you like the sun? How does it make you feel? If I get too hot, I’ll overheat and fry my circuitboards. What will happen to you if you get too hot? I hope it rains soon. How long has it been? What do you do differently when the sun is out? What do you like better, hot or cold weather? What do you associate with hot weather? Is the heat normal for this time of year?
